column4: Is there any kind of *stand alone* flash player for linux instead of viewing it in firefox?
I'll do some searching, see if I can find us somethin
I'm gonna try using it. Tell me how it works for you.
still trying to retrieve it....it seems to not exist on any mirror I go for
Came preinstalled on my system. Anywho, I think installing CVS is worth the prize.
maybe you can make me a .deb file whenever you get it installed.... I hate compiling.
dependency problems. might not be for a while.
Good news, it works. Bad news, it sucks. doesn't accept mouse clicks, no in-movie options.
